reviews.review: In the last few months amount of hackers increased drastically. Wont play until they do something about it
This game is very fun but has a huge learning curve. Best to play with people you know.

fun game, but to many aids russians and hackers

Simplesmente indescritível, o jogo é mt bom tem mecânicas ótimas, que te prende a querer aprender e aperfeiçoar, único problema é o anticheat mas temos plataformas com GC ou faceit e esportal que quebram esse galho

Très bon jeu, j'ai vraiment adoré l'immersion, que ce sois aux cotés des russes, ou même des pakistanais.
Ce fut une expérience très agréable, rempli de rebondissements et de plaisir.
super gra tylko trzeba się nauczyć najpierw grać a potem już jakoś leci

I have been playing CS since the first beta's back in the day. Game has come a long way still like it till today.
However the game is a bit more slow paced than the older versions wich can be a bit frustrating at times.
I do miss the old school buying menu's, just can't get used to the new somehow.
Definitly would recommend this to people especially since the game is FTP at this point.
This game is absolutely amazing with super good matchmaking and cool skins
Tirando os hackers, jogão! é o pai dos FPS, e de longe o mais competitivo!
